question: Tell me about a time you worked outside your comfort zone.
answer: Sure, I can give you an example. In my previous job, I was asked to lead a project that involved working with a team from a different department. This was outside my comfort zone because I had never worked closely with people outside my own team before. I had to learn how to communicate effectively with them, understand their perspectives, and collaborate to achieve our goals. It was challenging, but I was able to adapt and successfully lead the project to completion.

question: Where do you see yourself in 5 years?
answer: In five years, I envision myself in a leadership role within the company, utilizing my skills and experience to drive growth and innovation.
